spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant layout deviation. The complex staggered footprint of the original plan (specifically the protruding Bed-2 and the angular deck) has been simplified into a strictly rectangular bounded box. Door swings are mostly missing or poorly defined.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model lacks the primary exterior balcony/deck structure. While the roof is removed and there is a dark background, the structural reinterpretation into a square perimeter is a major failure. No UI/text present.

furniture_mapping.notes: Blocky furniture is used, but the quantity of beds does not accurately match the 4-bedroom plan. The dining table and kitchen counter placements are vague and lack proper scaling.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to aesthetic constraints. Low-poly, flat shading, and isometric orthographic view are perfectly executed. No textures or photorealistic lighting are present.

detected_errors.description: Footprint distorted from an L-shaped/staggered layout into a perfect rectangle.
Large exterior Deck/Balcony area from the top of the plan is entirely missing.
Structural reinterpretation of the exterior wall layout to eliminate architectural protrusions (e.g., Bed-2 area).
Internal door openings are mostly decorative indentations rather than functional architectural gaps.
